translated_review: Delicious. It's a popular spot that many people frequent.
A place I stopped by once

review_text: 일반적인 탕수육 맛이며 세일시간대가서 5천원 할인받음 기름이 깨끗햇는지 기름잡내가 안낫다 추천한다
translated_review: The sweet and sour pork has a typical taste, but I got a 5,000 won discount by going during the sale hours. The oil seemed clean because there wasn't any unpleasant oily smell. I recommend it.
The seasoning was a bit salty.

review_text: 짬뽕은 살짝 짰어요 그래도 나름 먹을만함
translated_review: The jjampong was a bit salty, but still quite enjoyable.

review_text: 이 폭염에 에어컨을 두대를 풀로 틀어도 모자랄 판에 한대만 틀어놨네요 찜통에서 식사 하고 나왔어요
translated_review: In this scorching heat, even having two air conditioners on full blast wouldn't be enough, but they had only one running. I felt like I was dining in a sauna.
Please clean up, you dirty people.
I think the Eum Nakseongdae location is better.

review_text: 짬뽕 하나를 배달에서 빼시는 초보적인 실수를… 사과도 제대로 안 하시는걸 보니 최근의 본사 차원의 교육이 무색한 듯 합니다.
translated_review: A basic mistake of leaving out a jjambbong in a delivery order... And it seems the recent training from headquarters has been in vain, given the lack of a proper apology.

review_text: 하도 욕을 먹길래 직접 가봄. 멀쩡한데...?
translated_review: I heard so many bad things about this place, so I decided to check it out myself. It’s perfectly fine...!
